idea-plugin.name: PlantUML Syntax Check
idea-plugin.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) Checks the syntax of a PlantUML file via ExternalAnnotator based on SyntaxChecker of plantuml.jar. This plugin requires idea plugin 'PlantUML integration' (http://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin?pluginId=7017).
idea-plugin.change-notes: Version 0.1.0 Use plantuml library version 7950. Known issues: Start and end tags are not checked. Text in front of start tag is not supported.
